She tries to get up and is hit by the blast. She falls to the ground 
motionelss, barely breathing,unconsious.

--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "Lord Unitron" <KSLawdogg@c...> wrote:
> Serpentor:
> 
> 
> 
> "I warned you..." Serpentor said softly, aiming his plasma launcher 
> at Shadow Wing, firing off a blast from the launcher at her.
